HA_HOTELNAME: beautiful and elegant 5 bdrm ocean front house with direct access to the ocean
Sentence: hot water was not consistently available for all bathrooms, a/c went in one room because of power outages
Verbatim: Property is beautiful and staff was very responsive but hot water was not consistently available for all bathrooms, a/c went in one room because of power outages. Wood Decking is in need of replacing and steps down to beach need to be repaired.

HA_HOTELNAME: bachelorette penthouse, pool +views & walk everywhere
Sentence: the power went out
Verbatim:
check in process… the address given to you by VRBO is not of this unit and you had to text the owner for checking in as it was never provided. the whole process is very shady as he gives you the address and tells you to bypass management, to a location of a hidden key (he will send you a video) and that key is not secured in any way… anyone has access to it or can find it. You then get the keys of the unit which are tracked meaning you are tracked by a Tile. (Mind you this unit is specifically stated for bachelorette parties) 

Unit over all is nice, def not meant for the number of people indicated you will trip over each other with all the cots and no room to walk! 
Rules are listed everywhere as if you are all ready going to break something…. Do not expect any amenities…Decor is nice. 

The building is all short term rental so be prepared for drunken knockers as we did two of the nights!

We were there Thurs - Sunday and the power went out, he didn’t have anything to say or help… and we are on the 32nd floor! 

Checking out, we did as the rules said, throw towels in and put the keys back where they all were… 

Tues- he sends nasty messages about us ripping blinds off the wall and charges us fees for this… we were a group of 3 on a girls trip so it’s safe to assume we were not throwing any ragers! Mind you we checked Sun and the key is in a very public location. We also asked for proof as he had two sets of blinds and one was not fully installed. 
No proof…

HA_HOTELNAME: brand new surf ranch bungalow
REVIEW_TITLE: don't let the photos fool you. beware
Sentence: - The power went out one night in the middle of the night and I had to contact the owner.
Verbatim:
Listing photos look amazing and lots of things appear “pretty” but I had major issues from the moment I arrived until the moment I left. 

- I arrived on a Saturday, during a rain storm, to leaks in both master bedroom and living room (all over sofa). I immediately contacted owner who lives close by but instead of coming over to look, she instructed me to put pots out to collect dripping water and that a roofer would come by Monday. Monday it was fixed but she left the dirty leak collecting pots in the sink for me to clean myself. Had I been the owner, I would have left a bottle of nice wine and an apology note, not a pile of dirty pots for my renter to clean. 

- The dishwater is faulty and did not clean dishes, It would run, but the dishes were still filthy after a cycle. I am an adult and quite familiar with using dishwashers, the owner instead of coming by to see for herself decided to give me a lesson on how to work the dishwasher. Regardless, I can attest that after 5 cycles the dishes never got clean. So, I spent two weeks having to hand washing all the dirty dishes. 

- The power went out one night in the middle of the night and I had to contact the owner. Thankfully, it was restored fairly quickly but no utility contact/account info was given in her inadequate "welcome book", so I was unable to get updates as to when the power would return. 

- The garage door is controlled by a digital lock with code but the system is funky and gave me trouble a few times. Additionally the garage is very small. The front door digital lock with code is also difficult, it seems to time out and the only thing to do is wait 15 minutes for it to reset. I was locked out after midnight one night and the owner did not return my texts until 6am. This is a basic safety issue and for this reason alone the apartment should not be rented until it is corrected. 

- Finally, the washer and dryer are in a janky downstairs room which is very grimy. The washer/dryer is not listed in the "welcome book" forcing me to inquire (yet again) about their whereabouts and usage. 

- I travel and use short term rentals 6-8 times per year and this experience was pretty awful. Wendy the owner was “mostly” responsive but consistently condescending. She also offered no credit for any of the above issues. Well, she did offer to let me out of my contract a few days early but it wasn’t worth leaving at that point. 

- In conclusion, don't judge this book by its cover!

HA_HOTELNAME: cabin in hocking hills state park on 101 acres
Sentence: Power went out when someone hit a pole and Dana reached out right away to be sure we were taken care of.
Verbatim:
Second time we have stayed here and it's the best. Great place for a group of any age. Dana is an A + owner. Power went out when someone hit a pole and Dana reached out right away to be sure we were taken care of. 
Thank you for another great memory.

HA_HOTELNAME: night smoke- a modern luxury 2 story cabin on a quiet private cul-de-sac
REVIEW_TITLE: false location on map, injury from leaking toilet, fireplace broken!
Sentence: Next day we noticed the bathroom in the room on the right has no power outlet.
Verbatim:
The property was really cute and nicely decorated, but we experienced one issue after another during our stay and management didn’t seem to care. 

Spent our whole first night trying to fix the fireplaces (neither worked). Called/texted the property manager several times before getting a reply. It was close to 10pm before we were able to negotiate and convince them to send maintenance. He got one indoor fire working but the outside one was broken. He advised us that “these break all the time.” We selected this property to be able to sit on the patio by the fire. They should be checking things like this before guests arrive, especially since they break so often. 

Next day we noticed the bathroom in the room on the right has no power outlet. Ironically, there is a hair dryer though.
The map location shows the cabin is directly in the center of town, but it’s actually about 11 miles away from where the map shows. Since Uber isn’t available in the area, getting to/from town cost us a $15/person shuttle ride (usually $10 but cabin is EXTRA far). 
Got home after a long day and ran to the bathroom (long shuttle ride) just to slip on a pool of water and dislocate my knee! Water was dripping out of the back of the toilet tank. I turned off the water and called/texted management for help. No one even responded until the next day! 

VBRO told me the host would contact me about our issues. It’s been over a week and no one has reached out. Worst trip ever!!

HA_HOTELNAME: hood canal, 1930's beach cottage,  315' cove with oysters!
Sentence: the power went out due to the heavy snow
Verbatim: It was a romantic getaway. It was such a cute cottage! Suzanne was so great and gave us so much information. We were there at the beginning of December, and the power went out due to the heavy snow. Suzanne was so helpful during our panic and even gave us a refund! We will definitely be going back again during the summer!

HA_HOTELNAME: villa in the heights of sainte anne with beautiful sea view
Sentence: la maison est très grande , fonctionnelle , il n' y manque rien ( sauf peut être une lampe torche pour les coupures de courant ) l' emplacement avec vue sur mer est super , le calme aussi , tant pis si il faut prendre la voiture à st anne qui ne se trouve qu' à 2 kms , il faudrait peut être penser à faire un bon rafraîchissement à l' intérieur de la maison ,
Verbatim: la maison est très grande , fonctionnelle , il n'y manque rien ( sauf peut être une lampe torche pour les coupures de courant ) l'emplacement avec vue sur mer est super , le calme aussi , tant pis si il faut prendre la voiture à st anne qui ne se trouve qu'à 2 kms , il faudrait peut être penser à faire un bon rafraîchissement à l'intérieur de la maison ,

HA_HOTELNAME: baker beach house - hot tub, ocean views & fire pit-
Sentence: There were instructions in the manual provided about what to do in the event of a power outage, but I am surprised that there is not a generator on the property if power loss is a regular occurrence.
Verbatim:
It is a lovely place tucked away in a private setting. We really enjoyed being there for a couple of days and would have loved to have been there for the rest of the week. Unfortunately, storms resulted in power loss for more than 30 hours, and after experiencing a full day of no hot tub, no laundry, no fridge, no oven, no hot water, etc., we had to make other plans because there was no indication the power would be restored any time soon. We left 1 1/2 days early.

There were instructions in the manual provided about what to do in the event of a power outage, but I am surprised that there is not a generator on the property if power loss is a regular occurrence. We did receive a partial refund (even though the contract does state that the owners are not liable for power loss, among other things), which we did appreciate. But unfortunately what we hoped to be a great week turned into a great couple of days, followed by a frustrating couple of days. Again, it is a lovely place, but maybe make sure you stay somewhere in the area that has a generator.

HA_HOTELNAME: peaceful and secluded beach house paradise
REVIEW_TITLE: great spot to enjoy time with family
Sentence: When power went out the generator kicked right in.
Verbatim: Extremely private spot with everything you need! When power went out the generator kicked right in. We never turned on the TVs but instead played cornhole, enjoyed the beach and snorkeling! Bring bug spray for sand flees.

HA_HOTELNAME: le flamboyant, sea view triplex, 3 bedrooms, residence with swimming pool
Sentence: Les points négatifs: les fourmis dans le logement, les 2 longues pannes de courant et les coupures d' eau !
Verbatim: Nous avons loué la résidence pour 5 nuits. Les points positifs sont la piscine à proximité et la vue magnifique sur la mer ! Les points négatifs: les fourmis dans le logement, les 2 longues pannes de courant et les coupures d’eau ! Pas pratique du tout pour se faire à manger.. Nous avons aussi manqué de certains éléments essentiels dans le logement, mais nous nous sommes débrouillés. Bon séjour en somme, mais qui pourrait être amélioré facilement concernant le ménage et les équipements mis à notre disposition.

HA_HOTELNAME: beautiful apartment in the heart of paris
Sentence: Erard and Luis were very responsive when there was an unexpected power outage in the apartment.
Verbatim: I stayed at Erard's apartment for 4 nights and it gave the sanctuary I needed after a full day of walking around Paris. It's very well-situated and the metro and Carrefour grocery are just steps away, not to mention restaurants and cafes in the neighborhood. As an American, I appreciated the amenities that I'm used to - a larger fridge, an LG washer/dryer, fast internet, an air purifier etc. Erard and Luis were very responsive when there was an unexpected power outage in the apartment. One thing to bear in mind - there is a hotel across the street and there will be some noise, usually of people talking, coming into the bedroom late into the night. However, it is not something that bothered me or my sleep as I am used to living in a big, vibrant city. I would definitely stay there again!

HA_HOTELNAME: cozy cabin near north fork and white rivers
Sentence: All went well despite unexpected inclimate weather and a temporary power outage just prior to arrival time.
Verbatim: All went well despite unexpected inclimate weather and a temporary power outage just prior to arrival time. The property owner communicated with me throughout the day and was most helpful in making it a great experience.

HA_HOTELNAME: quaint upstairs slc apartment
Sentence: Once I discovered there was no power to the thermostat, I contacted the property manager who, up until the day of check-in, had been very communicative.
Verbatim:
Wow, so much to say about such a short stay. Sigh...we booked this place for a ten night stay in Salt Lake over the Christmas and New Year holidays. We checked in on the 23rd and walked into an attic apartment with no heat. It was 28 degrees outside AND inside the place. We could literally see our breath, standing next to the bed. 

Once I discovered there was no power to the thermostat, I contacted the property manager who, up until the day of check-in, had been very communicative. He (Eddie) told me he had never heard of this problem and asked me to send him a picture of the thermostat, my name, and the address to the property where we were staying. Um, okay. I did that and he told me he would get back to me. Luckily we had family to meet and we were able to go to dinner somewhere that allowed us to keep our car running so the dogs didn't freeze. 

While we were still under the assumption that the heater would be fixed eventually, we bought a space heater at Costco ($90) and a bag of ice melt ($10) to try to remove the snow and ice that were frozen on the Excorcist-style metal staircase. Oh, a couple more fun facts - there was no lightbulb over the door at the top of the stairs and also no mat outside the door to keep from tracking everything onto the kitchen floor. 

I'm going to spare the frustrating story of my texts back and forth with Eddie about the heater not working, the neighbors trying to flip the breaker, and the property manager not being able to reach a technician because it was Christmas and just skip to the part where Eddie told me his solution was to cancel our reservation and issue a refund. Whaaaaaaat???

And so...we had no where to stay. On Christmas, with two big dogs and a truck full of the things needed to live life away from home for ten days. We ended up finding a place eventually, but had to pay another $1000+ on top of the $900 we had already paid to VRBO. 

Eddie told us on December 23rd that we would received a refund. We received it (after multiple texts and emails,) on January 5th. 

I understand this apartment is only used as a rental property. It's bare bones, which would have been fine if there had been heat. There were towels set out for us, so it looked like someone had prepared the place for our stay. Only no one had prepared. You would think if you were renting a property in the middle of winter, you would check to make sure the heater worked. Maybe they should actually visit the property once in a while?

HA_HOTELNAME: cozy midtown views of the city
Sentence: There were no power outlet available for the TV.
Verbatim: Talk about a nightmare. This apartment was a walking nightmare.The kitchen, bedroom(dirty sheets), bathroom, living room everything was dirty. And what’s with the weird huge light equipment in the bedroom? The place looked shady as hell! There were no clean towels or bed sheets supplied. No fresh toiletries were provided. The living room floor was sticky and all the carpets were dirty. The bathtub was dirty and the shower was broken . There were no power outlet available for the TV. Network name was not provided and none of the available network was accessible with the password provided. There was only 1 queen bed, so the listing was totally off chart for 5 guests. This is the worst place ever we had to spend a night. And we would rather sleep on the streets of Atlanta if we didn’t have a baby with us. IT WAS DISGUSTING! And to top it all, our baby caught some kind of nasty flu, God knows what kind of germs he caught from that trashy apartment! This place is charging 176$ per night for this??? we feel like we’ve been scammed!

HA_HOTELNAME: ‘beautiful property, excellent, service, ocean view villa, palmas del mar
Sentence: Puerto Rico has rolling power outages
Verbatim: Gosh, I hate to leave bad reviews but we couldn’t wait to leave this place. Not how you want to feel on vacation. The listing said the unit was newly renovated, it wasn’t. There was peeling paint, peeling leather couches, rust on metal items from the humidity. I wipe down the counters whenever I go somewhere and there was lots of hair and dust on the master bathroom counter. The 2 out of 3 of the toilets overflowed, and when we asked for help cleaning the floors from it the owner didn’t respond. Puerto Rico has rolling power outages and unfortunately we also had a loss of power for 12 hours. Other units still had power so I’m not sure if this was an isolated event or they had generators, but it was very inconvenient, especially with 2 small children including a baby. There was also visible mold, which is a big health issue. Would not stay here again or recommend.

HA_HOTELNAME: stemwinder 5 - can't beat the location of this spacious townhome! sleeps 11!
Sentence: Texted me the day of arrival to let me know about a power outage at the unit and then updated me through the day about the progress of getting it back on.
Verbatim: Located right off Powder Monkey lift just a short walk from the downstairs porch to the slopes. Has a wood burning fireplace with wood provided. Just bring something to help get it started. The managers are great to wok with! Texted me the day of arrival to let me know about a power outage at the unit and then updated me through the day about the progress of getting it back on. Were also quick to get back with me about staying an extra night! Will be looking to book this place for next year!

HA_HOTELNAME: bright & spacious 2br/1ba near uofh & downtown w/ free parking & wifi!
REVIEW_TITLE: did not get the apartment we reserved!!! plus, other issues. i would not rent this property!
Sentence: We were told that it was a power outage for the whole aera.
Verbatim: Upon our arrival to the property, we did not have the rental we reserved someone else was staying in the unit we ended up getting the blue one, which was not a real difference, but we had planned the orange. Then after we were in the property, we were locked in by the gate that was jammed, and we couldn't leave until after 11PM. Which was one whole night gone. The next day was my best friend's birthday so of course we woke up early to start the day with breakfast and some sightseeing. When we returned to change for her birthday dinner the power was out! We were told that it was a power outage for the whole aera. So, we had to reschedule our plans for her B-day being that we couldn't get ready. On Sunday we had a stopped-up toilet that was flooding, and the tub was backing up. Notified host and was told Maintenace would be over to fix it immediately. We left and started with our day stayed gone all day. We were contacted by the host around 7pm saying that they couldn't fix the bathroom until the next day, but they would give us access to another room to use the bathroom. Which I responded was crazy begin that we are two women, and you want us to leave the apartment and go to another apartment to use the bathroom. The bathroom was left a mess in our unit. I also notified the host of the bathroom being a mess. Host stated that he would see if he could move us to another unit being that he didn't know the bathroom was left a mess, but we never heard from him again that night. We were also accused of flushing baby wipes down the toilet which was the reason they said the toilet and tub was backing up. We did not flush baby wipes down any toilet. Of course, after this I reached out to VRBO Support, but they were no help, only saying they would reach out to the host letting him know my complaints and he should be in touch with me. The host was in contact with me but for my complaints just to let me know the Maintenance team would be coming to fix the problem. I asked the host if he had heard from VRBO Support, but he said he didn't know what I was talking about. The issues were fixed in time for my best friend and I to go to her re-planned birthday dinner on our last night in Houston. I would not book this property being that the host is not any help when you have problems. I understand things happen but then you have to be responsible and accountable for your property.

HA_HOTELNAME: secluded 2-home luxury estate on 11 acres w designer interior #relicsranch
Sentence: The owners of the VRBO could have easily said we can not host you as there were so many down trees and no power.
Verbatim: We faced so many challenges for this weeks wedding. The ice storm this week brought so much damage and destruction to all of central Texas. The owners of the VRBO could have easily said we can’t host you as there were so many down trees and no power. They did not. In fact they were out there cleaning up and moving limbs and trees in between the storms. They were determined to make our wedding weekend happen. They went way above and beyond by allowing us to host our rehearsal dinner at the VRBO since our wedding venue did not have power. Bex stayed in communication with me all weekend. I can’t possibly give them a high enough rating. Thank you guys so much!!! I have a happily married daughter!!!!

HA_HOTELNAME: penthouse loft apartment, privacy only 10 mins to austin
REVIEW_TITLE: scammer&terrible “host” do not give this man your money he will claim lies after you leave for more
Sentence: The 1st night we plugged in our small foreman grill which blew a breaker and we had no electricity until the “host” fixed it.
Verbatim: We tried to cancel before our arrival by calling Vrbo as we were worried about staying due to the very very cold and rude texts we received the day before checkin. We were very nice and courteous but this man has ZERO personality nor hosting skills. Vrbo called him he see if we could cancel due to our expressed fear (expressed to Vrbo representative) of staying at this property, she contacted him but he refused to refund our money and so did Vrbo even after expressing great concern for safety. We reluctantly decided to stay due to already paying. The “host” aka man on a power trip, met us in the driveway and right off the bat after showing me where to park yelled at me when I tried pulling up in the driveway because he felt he needed to watch me park as to not hit the mailbox. Once taken to the door he opened it, told us to take our shoes off as his wife had just “vacuumed “ the bright pink carpet 30yr old dirty carpet, took us up to the “room” in which looked like we were in a converted attic and we actually laughed the 2 days we were there as if we had a 1st college studio this would have been it!! Very very old furniture (no legs on the purple couch, all furniture obviously from garage sales) but the worst was the 30+yr old mattress covered in plastic that was soooo hard and in such bad condition I could hardly walk after getting up both mornings. As far as the “frat room” it has no tv, we were told only to use a radiator plug in heater (ice storm/schools&county closed, 20 degrees at night) due to the “expensive cost of propane that heats the home”. With this being a converted attic it was brutally cold and that radiator heater is so very dangerous, had it caused a fire our exit would have been scary given we were in a home behind a broken steel gate that had to be opened/closed by hand upon arrival/leaving. The 1st night we plugged in our small foreman grill which blew a breaker and we had no electricity until the “host” fixed it. We then got a message saying to unplug the heater if we needed to use other power as it would happen again….not cool. The bathroom was a nightmare!!! Now “host” is saying the 30yr old bed was broken, which is a flat lie and charging us $1300! We should have trusted our gut instinct as we knew before even getting to the property something was off with this man and sure enough, it was a scam. He admitted to listening to us in our room in a text. Creepy, liar and WILL prey on those he knows can “afford” to pay more

HA_HOTELNAME: condominium 206 matapalo ideal for family trips and work online.
REVIEW_TITLE: privacy issues, cleanliness and multiple vrbo violations
Sentence: weather was great, so not sure why there was no power
Verbatim:
The power was not on the first couple of hours. Messaged the host but did not hear back. Eventually it came on. We arrived in the middle of the afternoon, weather was great, so not sure why there was no power.

There was not any shampoo, soap, laundry detergent, extra garbage bags (only 1 provided) nor directions where to put trash. There were hairs in the bedsheets. Host never emailed the wifi info beforehand as the platform clearly said should have been done, and we only get it several hours later after asking. 

On check out, host told me to message her directly on WhatsApp to reserve instead of the platform, a clear violation of VRBO’s rules and regulations. She then bombarded us with unwanted messages and solicitations afterwards. 

She also told us the 2 people before us mentioned they also had no direction where to put any trash either. And that they take care of it and laundry, when I told her we washed towels. Clean ones were in the dryer and ones that need to be washed were in the washer. This did not need to be done by us, but was done anyways. Despite this, host sent a picture of little pieces of unneeded papers afterwards. 

There was also a non disclosed video camera recording the unit which is also another huge violation of VRBO’s policies.

Inside home was nice, with a nice garden, however no view of the pool as listed in the description. 
 
TV in extra bedroom did not work properly, and cut out every 10 seconds to a black screen for 10 seconds. 

Host also tried to trick us into in earlier check out time than what was listed in the VRBO. Luckily I had a screen shot of the correct check out time. But, I should not have had to go through that. Host also asked us our arrival time at least 3-4 times beforehand even though we had already sent that info each time it was asked. Perhaps the messages in the platform are not read by the host.

HA_HOTELNAME: cute cozy condo near ski resorts
Sentence: Well we woke up to no power still.
Verbatim: 3 people booked for 6 days, was only provided 3 towels to start. The heater only stays on for a little then shuts off. No extra toilet paper in the room. The power strip broke on the second night. And the final night, the power went out and the person we rented from didn't answer email, called condo front desk and was told they would get maintenance. Well we woke up to no power still. Overalll not a good experience. Would not book again.

HA_HOTELNAME: cute cozy condo near ski resorts
Sentence: And the final night, the power went out and the person we rented from did not answer email, called condo front desk and was told they would get maintenance.
Verbatim: 3 people booked for 6 days, was only provided 3 towels to start. The heater only stays on for a little then shuts off. No extra toilet paper in the room. The power strip broke on the second night. And the final night, the power went out and the person we rented from didn't answer email, called condo front desk and was told they would get maintenance. Well we woke up to no power still. Overalll not a good experience. Would not book again.

HA_HOTELNAME: light-filled lake house nestled in the north woods
REVIEW_TITLE: awesome stay! pictures don’t do it justice!
Sentence: helpful when power went out due to a tree falling on the power line
Verbatim: Super easy process. Ann was very responsive and helpful when power went out due to a tree falling on the power line.

HA_HOTELNAME:
secluded chalet. chester, vermont.
minutes to okemo
Sentence: Even with a brief unexpected power outage, the house was prepared to provide heat via an alternate source and Terri was very helpful with that.
Verbatim: We had a great trip and the house was an integral part of it. Even with a brief unexpected power outage, the house was prepared to provide heat via an alternate source and Terri was very helpful with that. The house was clean and has everything plus more that you’d expect in a vacation rental. I look forward to coming back.

HA_HOTELNAME: superb luxury villa 10 minutes away from the beach
REVIEW_TITLE: très belle maison, bien placé bien équipé, l’accueil est très agréable et la propriétaire elle l’éco
Sentence: On est obligé de fermer les volets si on peut pas avoir les moustiques si il y a des coupures d' électricité alors là à part ça tout était parfait
Verbatim: Le seul des grands agrément que j’ai pu constater à cette maison, c’est le manque les fenêtres ce qui fait que le soir on peut pas juste fermer la fenêtre. On est obligé de fermer les volets si on peut pas avoir les moustiques si il y a des coupures d’électricité alors là à part ça tout était parfait

HA_HOTELNAME: stylish penthouse with ocean views and beach access
Sentence: We ran into a couple issues the first day due to a city-wide power outage as the generator did not kick in right away.
Verbatim:
We ran into a couple issues the first day due to a city-wide power outage as the generator didn't kick in right away. Property manager was very responsive and helped us work through everything. I cannot express enough how great the property manager was!
Beds were very comfortable, but there was only one thick/firm style of pillow that will not work for stomach sleepers.
Pool or ocean are both a 5 minute walk away. And you are in walking distance to a few different restaurants. Twisted Lime was my personal fave. Just make sure you aren't starving before you get to the restaurant as service is quite a bit slower than we are used to in Canada. 
NOTE: Bon Vivants cafe and cocktail bar is directly below the primary bedroom. If you are an early to bed person, this would be an issue due to the late-night noise. However, we didnt understand hurricane doors - you have to pull the handle up to make the door shut properly. We didn't figure this out until midstay, which lessened the noise.
We went with our two children, 10 and 12, and felt quite safe. 
You can take the #10 bus to downtown Nassau. Route goes along the coast and is about a 20 minute ride. Bus can be caught anywhere on the side of the main road by flagging them down. And when you want to get off, just say "bus stop". Fare is $1.50 per person. NOTE: Do NOT take the #10A is this route winds inland and takes significantly longer. Cabs were more expensive than we were expecting, and they charge additional for more than two people ($50 to downtown one way for 5 people).
Overall, a really great place to stay, but everything was significantly more expensive than we were expecting in the Bahamas.

HA_HOTELNAME: style+space in sunny kona! full kitchen, private lanai, wifi, tv, laundry kanaloa 1602
REVIEW_TITLE: bad management/communication, unclean unit and power outages
Sentence: On top of all that, the power went out the next evening while I was trying to get ready for a dinner party and had to use the flashlight on my cell phone in order to shower and get dressed, which was quite difficult.
Verbatim: This was of the WORST experience I have ever had through VRBO. Check in details were lacking, which resulted in me not getting into my unit until very late in the night, and once I did get in, I discovered the unit had not been cleaned since the last guest stayed there and there were also no sheets on the bed. This was very disappointing and frustrating given that I had been traveling and working all day and was exhausted by the time I got to the unit and then had to sit on the phone for several hours with VRBO reps trying to get the mess sorted out. On top of all that, the power went out the next evening while I was trying to get ready for a dinner party and had to use the flashlight on my cell phone in order to shower and get dressed, which was quite difficult. It's a shame that this was not better managed because the location and surrounding community were great.

HA_HOTELNAME: *high season specials* exceptional beachfront 2br condo in cupecoy/private beach
Sentence: The screen on the bedroom sliding glass door to the balcony was trashed, so we could not open it for the lovely breeze that is available in the evening & also for air when the power went out!
Verbatim: Property was a bit worn from comparison with the pictures. The property description proclaimed there were lounge chairs on the balcony overlooking the sea, when in actuality there were 4 plastic, hard, upright chairs that were not at all conducive to relaxation & a half-broken wooden table to place your drink on! We would have liked to spend more time on the balcony, but the chairs were too uncomfortable. The balcony handrails were all rusted and needed repair, while the neighboring condo rails were in great shape. We were allowed in early to enjoy the pool/beach, as the cleaning lady knew she had to work well after 5PM to make it right for us from the mess left behind from the previous renter. She was super! There were dirty dishes left in the dishwasher undone, & a frying pan with food still attached was found in the oven. We had to clean all the utensils, pots, & dishes that we wanted to use before we could use them. There was minimal TV service, & were told upon check-in that we would have to have our own subscription to Hulu, or Netflix etc, which we don"t subscribe to. This needs to be addressed in the description of the property for those without subscriptions, as internet service was our only access to outside news - when it was working. The screen on the bedroom sliding glass door to the balcony was trashed, so we could not open it for the lovely breeze that is available in the evening & also for air when the power went out!- which may have been a blessing since there were 2 stray cats that took up residence on our 1st floor balcony during the night. The master bath shower area is cave-like & really needed a power vent to remove the moisture, but that was broken. The stove top is barely working, as the touch pad is so worn it is difficult to adjust the temperature & to turn on & off. The paint on the ceiling is peeling off in the common kitchen area, & the refrigerator water/ice machine with the filter is inop so no potable water. The condo has the absolute BEST location in the entire complex with direct access to the pools & the beach is just steps away. Good parking is available close to the front door & is by gated access only with guard 24/7. This poor condo needs some TLC and it would be absolutely awesome!! We enjoyed St Maarten and this building location gives easy driving access to both the French & Dutch side restaurants, and the airport, while providing a very peaceful & restful atmosphere. Just needs a little TLC!

HA_HOTELNAME: modern, clean family home on nature lagoon and blocks away from rockaway beach!
Sentence: We lost power for 24 hours (we actually expected it to be longer), and Jenny had warned us it might cut out.
Verbatim:
The important things first: Jenny is an excellent host, all communication was quick and easy. The house met all our needs and the location was what we were looking for (quiet, good space, and out-of-the-way). 

Caveat: we stayed Dec-Jan, winter months, no idea what summer is like in Rockaway Beach!

This is the longest we've stayed at a single place (almost 2 months), so we were wary, it was a big gamble. But, the house was a nice surprise. Great wifi, plenty of space for those rainy days when you can't go out, better than average tools in the kitchen, and deer, ducks, egrets, more birds, visiting the pond next door (literally, outside the porch). The neighborhood was quiet, the beach is walking distance (we did that a lot, it's a great walking beach), there's hiking in the hill to the back (did that a lot too, no seems to make use of it, even though hikers are welcome, never saw anyone else there). 

We even survived the huge storm of December just fine, although things outside didn't fare as well (BBQ grill, chairs and table went flying). 64mph winds will do that! We lost power for 24 hours (we actually expected it to be longer), and Jenny had warned us it might cut out. Either we lucked out or things have gotten much better in Rockaway, but that was the only time we lost power.

As for Rockaway Beach, if you're looking for restaurants and shopping in the winter... not gonna happen! It's a typical tourist town, beholden to the summer months, so not much open. It's exactly what we expected, so no surprise. Stock up in Tillamook or visit Astoria and the Costco, you should be good to go.

If you're looking for a clean, comfortable, quiet place (in the winter, at least), with a great host, this is an excellent house.

HA_HOTELNAME: modern, clean family home on nature lagoon and blocks away from rockaway beach!
Sentence: Either we lucked out or things have gotten much better in Rockaway, but that was the only time we lost power.
Verbatim:
The important things first: Jenny is an excellent host, all communication was quick and easy. The house met all our needs and the location was what we were looking for (quiet, good space, and out-of-the-way). 

Caveat: we stayed Dec-Jan, winter months, no idea what summer is like in Rockaway Beach!

It's exactly what we expected, so no surprise. Stock up in Tillamook or visit Astoria and the Costco, you should be good to go.

If you're looking for a clean, comfortable, quiet place (in the winter, at least), with a great host, this is an excellent house.

HA_HOTELNAME: santana row the rodeo drive of silicon valley!
Sentence: Property manager, Connor was incredibly responsive as I was there during the city wide power outages
Verbatim:
The condo was perfectly located on Santana Row to enjoy restaurants, coffee shops, and shopping without getting in your car! Was here visiting my daughter and could not have been more perfectly situated! Property manager, Connor was incredibly responsive as I was there during the city wide power outages and he did everything possible to make the situation as painless as possible. 
My only suggestion is to change out the pull out sofa. It was too hard to sleep on for my daughter who is used to camping and sleeping on the ground. The main bedroom had a very comfy mattress though and the living room sofa and little office setup were perfect for my working stay! Highly recommend!

HA_HOTELNAME: quiet fort myers getaway with private, screened-in pool; close to beaches & golf
Sentence: No power in one bedroom.
Verbatim: We did enjoy our stay with one major problem. Management company didn’t take care of the problems we had. Asked for pool to be heated, charged my credit card, and never heated the pool. Still waiting for credit. No power in one bedroom. They said electrician never showed up. Very unhappy about lack of “personal “ communications.

HA_HOTELNAME: charming, dog-friendly beach cabin w/ a full kitchen & great location!
Sentence: the power went out
Verbatim: We came on a Friday night and everything was lovely. The door wasn’t locked (the deadbolt seemed like it hasn’t properly engaged). The beds were very creeky but comfortable. We woke up and made breakfast and then the power went out. We ate breakfast and then found the breaker box and flipped the breakers. The lights came back on. We thought everything was good after that but then we went to wash the dishes from our breakfast and the water wasn’t working. We contacted the company, bought a few gallons of water so that we could flush the toilets, and then went to the beach. The beach is not a short path away. It is a rather long road down several streets. We kept asking people we passed where the path was and they laughed and said we were better off driving. When we came back from the beach we started to make lunch and realized that even though the lights were on, the oven hadn’t come back on. So we went out to lunch. When we came back from lunch we put the babies down for a nap. We adjusted the heaters in the rooms and found out that the heaters weren’t working (neither the cadets in the wall or the ductless system that was lighting up like it was on but no air was coming out). We really wanted to stay and did enjoy our first night there, but we couldn’t figure out why the water, oven and heaters weren’t working. At that point we decided to end our trip early and go home to make sure it was safe for our babies who we were worried about getting too cold without heat. After we packed everything up, my husband checked that the door was locked and the door handle came off.

HA_HOTELNAME: dog-friendly cabin w/great mountain view, hot tub, air hockey, outdoor waterfall
Sentence: Hot tub had no electricity
Verbatim:
Hot tub had no electricity and I reported to Vacasa right after checking in, I also drove to local Vacasa office, Helen, GA, twice the day after checking in, they knew about my problem, and no resolution or option was offered. 
Online description didn’t mention the hot tub was not working. 
My vacation was very disappointing.

HA_HOTELNAME: mid-mod style with modern comfort!
Sentence: Very responsive to any issues, including going above and beyond during a local power outage to ensure we were ok and even brought lanterns.
Verbatim:
Great experience from beginning to end; making the reservation, pre-trip communication & on stie support all the way through check out. Property even better than expected. Well appointed. Location great; near downtown & airport in historic neighborhood. Great to have 3 bedrooms and casita with 2 beds for the five of us. Pool, hot tub, sauna, and fire pit all awesome. Care put into the furnishings. Property clean and organized.
Rob provided high level customer service/white glove concierge attention. Thanks, Rob.
Comments from a couple of the other guests:
“… the house was absolutely fabulous — well-appointed and perfectly on theme. Rob was by far the most helpful and responsive property manager I’ve ever worked with. When advised the first morning that the master bath toilet wasn’t usable, he sent Christian over right away. Christian had it repaired and the bathroom cleaned within 2 hours. Great, friendly service!”
“Outstanding customer service. Very responsive to any issues, including going above and beyond during a local power outage to ensure we were ok and even brought lanterns. 
Location is quiet, yet still close to downtown and local attractions. 
Décor and usability of the home is excellent. Well-appointed kitchen. Practical yet stylish furnishing. LP collection is so FUN! 
Perfect space to relax and enjoy all that PS has to offer.”

HA_HOTELNAME: family friendly resort ~ north shore kauai ~ 2b deluxe ~ sleeps 6 ~near hanalei!
REVIEW_TITLE: disappointing customer service and not clean
Sentence: Tvs stopped working after power outage and breaker had to be flipped to get spare bedroom power functioning.
Verbatim: We had issue after issue with the unit and the customer service. Unit was dirty. We had to clean it. Used soap left behind on shower, wine stained carpet, holes in carpet, gum stuck to side of master bed night stand, stepped on a screw left behind, dirty socks and paper behind couch. Tvs stopped working after power outage and breaker had to be flipped to get spare bedroom power functioning. No biggie there but then cable boxes had to be replaced..since they werent functional then a few days later the tv in the master stopped displaying video so maintenance had to replace it. Towel service takes all day/night and they dont give you enough for the number of guests. For a family of 5 we got 4. When we asked for more it was an issue for them. They’ll say they will send it right over but you just need to be prepared it isnt timely and set your expectations for that. We ended up just washing our pool and shower towels. One front desk person was especially unkind. Housekeeping came to measure the curtains in all rooms unannounced the day before we checked out… they could have waited a day instead of interrupting our lunch. Pool was closed after big storm as well. That was understandable. But on top of all the fees paid through vrbo (hundreds and hundreds) there is another resort fee you pay. Id like some of these refunded for all the hassle. I have a list of all issues, days, number of calls, etc.

HA_HOTELNAME: new to market! spacious beach retreat, steps to sugary sand, conveniences and fun!
Sentence: But we did not expect the lack of power in the back bedroom, hall bath, kitchen, except the fridge,(light worked, but it was not cold.
Verbatim: When we arrived the place was clean and we expected the storm damage. But we didn’t expect the lack of power in the back bedroom, hall bath, kitchen, except the fridge,(light worked, but it wasn’t cold. A/C or internet did not work. Call and left a message with the management company, they had no emergency contact number. Because of the lack of power A/C and internet we elected not to stay and contacted VRBO to request our money to be refunded. We understand the hurricane damage but advertising with pre hurricane picture and data is miss leading. Will be a great place to stay after the damage is all repaired.

HA_HOTELNAME: new to market! spacious beach retreat, steps to sugary sand, conveniences and fun!
Sentence: Because of the lack of power A/C and internet we elected not to stay and contacted VRBO to request our money to be refunded.
Verbatim: When we arrived the place was clean and we expected the storm damage. But we didn’t expect the lack of power in the back bedroom, hall bath, kitchen, except the fridge,(light worked, but it wasn’t cold. A/C or internet did not work. Call and left a message with the management company, they had no emergency contact number. Because of the lack of power A/C and internet we elected not to stay and contacted VRBO to request our money to be refunded. We understand the hurricane damage but advertising with pre hurricane picture and data is miss leading. Will be a great place to stay after the damage is all repaired.

HA_HOTELNAME: spacious & cheerful pico slopeside condo - walk to lift & ski back! pico 304
Sentence: Power went out twice.
Verbatim: Home was very cold inside. Wind coming through door. You could see daylight through the door jams. Cable tv did not work. Power went out twice. Kitchen was not very well equipped with cooking items, baking pan, colander, potato masher, etc. Very outdated for the price. Location was great

HA_HOTELNAME: lakeview cottage
Sentence: Snow, ice, sleet...and even when we experienced a couple of power outages, the host was in immediate communication, a sending over a local handyman to fix the broken water pipes during the famous SIBERIAN EXPRESS that hit more than 1/2 of the U.S.
Verbatim: Spring, summer and fall in the Ozarks is beautiful....but winter has it's own wonder to it ....Snow, ice, sleet...and even when we experienced a couple of power outages, the host was in immediate communication, a sending over a local handyman to fix the broken water pipes during the famous SIBERIAN EXPRESS that hit more than 1/2 of the U.S. We were always warm and even the neighbors brought bottled water and offered food. Thanks to everyone! Things always happen beyond our control, but the host was right on top of it all.

HA_HOTELNAME: guadalupe getaway | hip decor, comfortable, unique!
REVIEW_TITLE: great place but false promises - hot tub doesn't work
Sentence: 2) when power went out no guest access to reset router (which is needed and frequent power outages though short here), so hopefully owners will move to guest accessible area for future.
Verbatim:
Sadly I have to leave a poor review which mostly is directed towards the Grand Welcome Property Management Company.

First positives- place is in great condition/decor and great location, 24 on call property management was responsive during stay during power outage

Negatives- 
1) Biggest problem was advertised hot tub was NEVER useable and property managers knew this according to our conversations. I also have written texts from Grand Welcome employee stating will be compensated/reimbursed for nonuseable hot tub but this NEVER happened. I contacted Grand Welcome on VRBO website, text, phone - NO RESPONSE. I really didn't want to leave a bad review but this was poor follow through adn we had many other property options without hot tubs that we passed up for this place. 

2) when power went out no guest access to reset router (which is needed and frequent power outages though short here), so hopefully owners will move to guest accessible area for future. 
3) Not enough parking, only space for 2 cars in driveway and no additional street parking so another guest had to park in a grocery lot in town. 

Happy to take down my bad review if I get the refund for HOT TUB NOT WORKING.

HA_HOTELNAME: guadalupe getaway | hip decor, comfortable, unique!
REVIEW_TITLE: great place but false promises - hot tub doesn't work
Sentence: First positives- place is in great condition/decor and great location, 24 on call property management was responsive during stay during power outage
Verbatim:
Sadly I have to leave a poor review which mostly is directed towards the Grand Welcome Property Management Company.

First positives- place is in great condition/decor and great location, 24 on call property management was responsive during stay during power outage

Negatives- 
1) Biggest problem was advertised hot tub was NEVER useable and property managers knew this according to our conversations. I also have written texts from Grand Welcome employee stating will be compensated/reimbursed for nonuseable hot tub but this NEVER happened. I contacted Grand Welcome on VRBO website, text, phone - NO RESPONSE. I really didn't want to leave a bad review but this was poor follow through adn we had many other property options without hot tubs that we passed up for this place. 

2) when power went out no guest access to reset router (which is needed and frequent power outages though short here), so hopefully owners will move to guest accessible area for future. 
3) Not enough parking, only space for 2 cars in driveway and no additional street parking so another guest had to park in a grocery lot in town. 

Happy to take down my bad review if I get the refund for HOT TUB NOT WORKING.

HA_HOTELNAME: luxury living at the catalina foothills
Sentence: There had been a power outage and we could not get reception for tv's.
Verbatim: This was the second time we stayed in this unit. We were there last year also. The weather did not permit us to use the pool area. Pros: Owner always responded quickly to anything we needed. There had been a power outage and we could not get reception for tv's. He did everything he could to help us and the problem was resolved. The new refrigerator with an ice maker was a welcome addition. Bedding is very nice and so is furniture. The back patio has a beautiful view of the Catalina Foothills and is a very quiet area. It is also very close to restaurants and grocery stores. The spare bedroom was nice and so is the second bathroom. Cons: We did notice some areas that could use some attention from last year. The kitchen ware is very nice but there is only a setting of four for dishes and utensils. This could be a problem if you have a larger group. The area rug in living room needs cleaned but overall the condo is very clean.

HA_HOTELNAME: les arcs 1800. luxury residence with heated pool and parking. ski-in ski-out.
REVIEW_TITLE: bel appartement mais des détails à revoir
Sentence: Éclairage trop faible + 1 grande baie vitrée condamnée. -Chambres trop chaudes la nuit (chauffage coupé) et sans aération possible (pas de fenêtres). -coupures électriques en journée en raison d' une modulation de la puissance accessible -Manque porte de séparation avec la salle de bain dans une chambre.
Verbatim:
Grand appartement, bien aménagé, belle décoration, confortable, vaste, calme et bien situé. Vaisselle plus que complète. Petite enceinte disponible pour diffuser de la musique. 
Les bémols :
-Manquaient les draps pour 2 lits à notre arrivée. L'agence nous a fourni le lendemain matin. 
-salon manquant de luminosité. Éclairage trop faible + 1 grande baie vitrée condamnée.
-Chambres trop chaudes la nuit (chauffage coupé) et sans aération possible (pas de fenêtres). 
-coupures électriques en journée en raison d'une modulation de la puissance accessible
-Manque porte de séparation avec la salle de bain dans une chambre. Pas pratique pour laisser dormir et indiscrétions. 
-il faut monter un escalier d'un étage pour passer du casier à skis à l'extérieur et partir skis aux pieds.
Nous avons néanmoins passé un excellent séjour et beaucoup apprécié l'appartement ainsi que la station. Les points positifs sont bien plus nombreux que les bémols.

HA_HOTELNAME: on the beach ! beach tulip, a french touch unit, pools, sea view
Sentence: Il y aussi eu une panne d' électricité et deux pannes d' eau courante.
Verbatim: Nous connaissions déjà l’endroit et y retournions avec certaines attentes, mais pas trop élevées à cause d’Irma. Le condo adjacent au nôtre était en rénovation. Pendant 4 des 10 jours de notre séjour, nous avons subi le bruit de démolition de béton, sans aucun préavis avant et durant notre séjour. Il y aussi eu une panne d’électricité et deux pannes d’eau courante. Il reste que le site est magnifique et l’île, paradisiaque.

HA_HOTELNAME: 4 bedrooms w/loft, walk to the lifts and sleeps a crowd
REVIEW_TITLE: should say sleeps 10 not 12, rude property managers, overpriced
Sentence: The power went out upstairs after the first day
Verbatim:
The pullout couch bed option is not really an option. It was a horribly uncomfortable contraption… could not sleep through night on it. They also did not leave spare sheets even though we emailed about it before hand.

The power went out upstairs after the first day and the property managers could not tell me where the breakers were. The outlets were randomly going out as well.

The listing should say that it only sleeps 10. It’s pretty outdated and dirty. The experience was not great.

The only good thing was the location. But it should be priced significantly less for everything else.

HA_HOTELNAME: ***maui true paradise***penthouse #601**top floor corner end unit***
REVIEW_TITLE: not what i signed up for
Sentence: On top of that, when we finally decided to try the television after dinner to watch something the power went out for 2.5 hours.
Verbatim: Since they asked me to review this property I shall review it exactly as I saw it and experienced it. This was the "Penthouse end unit" I rented. I had the misconception that it meant a larger wrap around deck which it didn't. I arrived to the unit at 5 pm only to find the parking lot covered in the most disgusting mud I have ever seen. About a third of the parking lot was so deeply covered in mud you couldn't park so the rest of the spaces in the lot were always taken. I found a narrow slit to park in and slipped and slid all the way to the entrance. I ruined my new shoes as were covered in mud. This was from rains that occurred earlier in the week. The streams pouring on to the street and into the ocean there were carrying the mud from the mountainside and putting it everywhere including the beach and water which was now the color of my morning coffee. The unit itself is a well used rental and looks the part. The television in the living room was watchable but never managed to figure how to stream as I believe it wasn't connected to the wifi. The bedroom tv was postage stamp size which I never turned on. The unit had most everything there but just all basic and nothing one would consider luxury. Furniture was well used and just left the impression of minimal amounts to get the job done. The coup d' etat was that we were told to move our cars to clean the parking lot. The problem is there is nowhere to park your car off property and it was a half mile round trip for me to park my car and then I was stuck in the mud in the process. Totally uncalled for. The worst part was I sent a note to the manager explaining my displeasure but was told basically, mahalo. On top of that, when we finally decided to try the television after dinner to watch something the power went out for 2.5 hours. The best part was the beach to the south was most interesting and a great place to watch sea life and the sunset. When you check in they require you to get a parking pass and such. The problem is they are only open from 9 am to 2pm which is difficult since you can't check in until 3 pm. The last straw was it was unit 601 which is directly on the street of Kihei blvd and so the noise was ungodly. I never, ever would have rented a unit like this in that location but you don't know. The view was even compromised and the picture they use is from the one angle you could actually see the water decently. During a zoom call I had to mute my mic due to the noise.

HA_HOTELNAME: diamond harbour hideaway
Sentence: Only bad thing kitchen cupboard not clean invaded with ants had no power or spray, spent first hour cleaning out kitchen cupboard and washing all kitchen equipment thank God for dishwasher
Verbatim: Property was beautiful, well stocked with everything you needed loved it. Only bad thing kitchen cupboard not clean invaded with ants had no power or spray, spent first hour cleaning out kitchen cupboard and washing all kitchen equipment thank God for dishwasher

HA_HOTELNAME: extravagant club wyndham nashville, 2 bedroom condo
REVIEW_TITLE: great property with the exception of...
Sentence: On the last day, the state was experiencing inclement weather & power outages.
Verbatim:
Upon check-in, I was told by concierge that because of Covid, the property is only starting to see more visitors and that they were only looking for feedback on our stay & the employees. I am always happy to give feedback and was willing to spend 30 minutes to do so. I was also very clear that I was not interested in any sales pitch and was assured that was not the at all what this was. They lied. The property has a very sophisticated vacation "timeshare" program and took two hours of my time. The only guidance I received from the Christian was to state that I was a guest of Mr. XXX" which I did several times but that did not prevent them from the pitch. Felt as if he could have been more forthcoming with what to expect. 

On the last day, the state was experiencing inclement weather & power outages. Given the property was only at 20% capacity, I reached out to Christian to ask if we could extend our stay 24 hours until the roads cleared and was told they could not since the reservation was completed. I was given the suggestion to the front desk and ask (which I did) only to be given the off the street room rate of 3.5x what we originally paid. I was shocked and disappointed. 

I will provide a thumbs up to the condo itself. It was clean, comfortable and perfectly suited for my family.

HA_HOTELNAME: beautiful home near beach with private pool, gas grill, washer/dryer - 1 dog ok
Sentence: Then we had no power or water the last day we were trying to pack up to leave.
Verbatim: This property is so far off the main road you can’t get a taxi or Uber so you must rent an suv. An SUV is a must since the roads are all dirt and have horrible dips. They only had a little car and we got 2 flat tires from the roads. We had no running water for 16 hours during the week. Then we had no power or water the last day we were trying to pack up to leave. The sofa was pretty dirty and you didn’t want to use. The shower head has such lower water pressure it’s hard to get all the shampoo and conditioner out so, I looked like a grease head the whole time. The pool was dirty when we arrived and after 8 days it was still never cleaned. There is a canopy over the pool which has large carabiners connection which was fine until the wind blows in the night and they are banging on the the roof all night long. There was weeks worth of bird poop on the deck in which we scrubbed for a while trying to clean because you couldn’t access the door way without stepping in it.

HA_HOTELNAME: 5bd 5.5ba w/ pool home.  an oasis just minutes to downtowns sonoma & glen ellen
Sentence: The property manager was super responsive when there was a neighborhood wide power outage.
Verbatim: We rented Twelve Oaks with four other couples this past fall. The pictures online are beautiful, but seeing the property in person is jaw-dropping. We all were blown away by the meticulous grounds, the countless amenities, the roominess of the bedrooms and living areas, the large kitchen, the pool house... We could not have found a more perfect place to stay. The proximity to Sonoma Plaza and our chosen wineries made it an ideal location for all our plans. The property manager was super responsive when there was a neighborhood wide power outage. Don't miss out on this fantastic home!

HA_HOTELNAME: tropical resort- clean and quiet. a  short stroll to the beach!
Sentence: mud in our parking lot, and a power outage
Verbatim: The condo is completely updated, well-equipped w/everything we needed for cooking at home and spending time at the beach. During our stay we had unusual weather causing flash flooding, mud in our parking lot, and a power outage--our host and the neighbors were wonderfully helpful in looking out for us during these unexpected events. Also, after I put an ink spot on the brand new, (very comfy) pull-out couch, the host was extremely kind and reassuring in getting it removed. Always buy the insurance! Thank you, Susan, for a magical and comfortable Maui experience!

HA_HOTELNAME: brand new surf ranch bungalow
Sentence: The power went out one night in the middle of the night and I had to contact the owner.
Verbatim: Pics looks amazing and lots of things appear “pretty” but I had MAJOR issues from the moment I arrived until the moment I left. I arrived on a Saturday, during a rain storm, to leaks in both master bedroom and living room all over sofa. I immediately contacted owner who apparently lives close. Instead of coming over to look right away she instructed me to put pots out to collect water and roofer would come Monday. Monday it was fixed BUT she actually left me the pots in the sink to clean myself!! Unreal. I would have left a bottle of good wine if it was my place! The dishwater did not clean dishes adequately. I am 46 and very familiar with using dishwashers, since the owner seemed to think I needed a review, and can attest that after 5 cycles my dishes were not clean. The power went out one night in the middle of the night and I had to contact the owner. Thankfully it was restored fairly quickly but no utility info was given in her shitty welcome book. The tv in the bedroom did not work initially. The garage door is funky and gave me trouble a few times and is VERY small. The front door punch code is also a pain in the ass and I was locked out after midnight one night and the owner did not return my texts until 6am. Not ok and not safe. Additionally, the washer and dryer are in a janky room downstairs and very grimy. It also isn’t listed in her welcome book and I needed to inquire about their whereabouts and usage. I travel a ton and this experience was fairly awful. Wendy the owner was “mainly” responsive but super condescending and in no way offered any kick back due to my issues. She offered to let me out of my contract a few days early but it wasn’t worth me leaving at that point. I do not recommend!!!

HA_HOTELNAME: reviews say clean, like home! walk to restaurants, free wifi/parking! beach!
Sentence: We had one minor power outage, think maybe 2 hours.
Verbatim:
This is a great place to stay!
The location is the best spot on the whole island (central to everything and great beaches) favourite was the big beach.

The place was spotless! The cooler, beach chairs and water cooler was game changer. Full kitchen plus pay it forward is nice. (Forgot to bring shampoo and conditioner.)

I had to work on this vacation the wifi worked great. 

We had one minor power outage, think maybe 2 hours. We were gone that day, so that we wouldn’t have even noticed. Kev checked in, gave us an update, and told us where the flashlight was. 

Kev gave some great recommendations of things to see and do. Defiantly will stay here again.

HA_HOTELNAME: el cid social club - 3 bedroom
REVIEW_TITLE: great house, close to airport and downtown!
Sentence: Issues with getting access to house when we arrived and did not receive timely response from property management company regarding power outage on 1st day of our stay.
Verbatim: House is great! Previous review about slippery pool deck, short duration on master bathroom light timer and not enough paper goods was accurate. Issues with getting access to house when we arrived and did not receive timely response from property management company regarding power outage on 1st day of our stay. However, property management company was quick to send someone out to change battery in keyless entry lock, restock all needed supplies and even sent someone out to be sure all items came back up after power outage. Would recommend to others, close to airport and downtown!

HA_HOTELNAME: el cid social club - 3 bedroom
REVIEW_TITLE: great house, close to airport and downtown!
Sentence: However, property management company was quick to send someone out to change battery in keyless entry lock, restock all needed supplies and even sent someone out to be sure all items came back up after power outage.
Verbatim: House is great! Previous review about slippery pool deck, short duration on master bathroom light timer and not enough paper goods was accurate. Issues with getting access to house when we arrived and did not receive timely response from property management company regarding power outage on 1st day of our stay. However, property management company was quick to send someone out to change battery in keyless entry lock, restock all needed supplies and even sent someone out to be sure all items came back up after power outage. Would recommend to others, close to airport and downtown!

HA_HOTELNAME: ✭cozy small apart w/ ac❤wifi hato rey centro
Sentence: We were told it was due to near by explosion- maybe power outage and since it was over a weekend they could not call for help as company was closed.
Verbatim: Great place. Only problem was no Wi-Fi/ internet entire stay. We were told it was due to near by explosion- maybe power outage and since it was over a weekend they could not call for help as company was closed.

HA_HOTELNAME: bachelorette penthouse, pool +views & walk everywhere
Sentence: We were there Thurs - Sunday and the power went out, he did not have anything to say or help… and we are on a high floor of the building....
Verbatim:
check in process… the address given to you is not of this unit and you had to text the owner for checking in as it was never provided. the whole process is strange as he gives you the address and tells you to bypass management, to a location of a hidden key (he will send you a video) and that key is not secured in any way… anyone has access to it or can find it. You then get the keys of the unit which are tracked meaning you are tracked by a Tile.

Unit over all is nice, def not meant for the number of people indicated you will trip over each other with all the cots and no room to walk! It is not a three bedroom unit, but two with a murphy bed in the living space tucked in the corner. 
Rules are listed everywhere as if you are all ready going to break something…. Do not expect any amenities…Decor is nice. 

The building is all short term rental so be prepared for drunken people knocking on doors. 

We were there Thurs - Sunday and the power went out, he didn’t have anything to say or help… and we are on a high floor of the building....

Checking out, we did as the rules said, throw towels in and put the keys back where they all were… 

Tues- he sends nasty messages about us ripping blinds off the wall and charges us fees for this… Mind you we checked out Sun and the key is in a very public location. We also asked for proof as he had two sets of blinds and one was not fully installed. 
No proof… 
Take a pass on this nice unit all bc of the owner

HA_HOTELNAME: lodge 21 - 3 bed sea-view  -  a john o'groat that sleeps 6 guests  in 3 bedrooms
Sentence: Our only complaint is that we were not informed of what was clearly a scheduled power outage on our last morning which was inconvenient, to say the least.
Verbatim: Everything was as advertised and was terrific. The location is stunning. The lodge was clean and comfortable. The appliances did their jobs and the fireplace, bedding, and every other detail were all just right. Our only complaint is that we were not informed of what was clearly a scheduled power outage on our last morning which was inconvenient, to say the least.

HA_HOTELNAME: luxury villa on lake arenal - adventure + relaxation - quiet gated community
REVIEW_TITLE: great location - family friendly, close to all things arenal
Sentence: We also lost power for about an hour the day of check out and had to find a neighbor to help us get it back on.
Verbatim: Overall we had a great experience at this location. Upon arrival the place was clean and welcoming. The location is great for all things in the Arenal region (Mistico, Rio Celeste, Hot Springs, etc). The experience of waking up to the sounds of rain, listening to Howler Monkeys and seeing Toucans at this property were absolutely amazing. The only issues we had were the check in/out process. We had to plan a time to meet with the property manager to obtain the keys/fob to get into the gated community and then we had to plan a time to leave. The communication behind this was tough as using USA cell phones in this area is almost non existent due to cell coverage. We also lost power for about an hour the day of check out and had to find a neighbor to help us get it back on. Overall it is an absolutely lovely place and the host does a great job of suppling a good amount of information about the area with their website/app. Highly recommend for families, just make sure to have prior communication with property manager about check-in/out process.

HA_HOTELNAME: bachelorette penthouse, pool +views & walk everywhere
Sentence: the power went out
Verbatim:
check in process… the address given to you is not of this unit and you had to text the owner for checking in as it was never provided. the whole process is strange as he gives you the address and tells you to bypass management, to a location of a hidden key (he will send you a video) and that key is not secured in any way… anyone has access to it or can find it. You then get the keys of the unit which are tracked meaning you are tracked by a Tile.

Unit over all is nice, def not meant for the number of people indicated you will trip over each other with all the cots and no room to walk! 
Rules are listed everywhere as if you are all ready going to break something…. Do not expect any amenities…Decor is nice. 

The building is all short term rental so be prepared for drunken people knocking on doors. 

We were there Thurs - Sunday and the power went out, he didn’t have anything to say or help… and we are on the 32nd floor! 

Checking out, we did as the rules said, throw towels in and put the keys back where they all were… 

Tues- he sends nasty messages about us ripping blinds off the wall and charges us fees for this… Mind you we checked out Sun and the key is in a very public location. We also asked for proof as he had two sets of blinds and one was not fully installed. 
No proof… 
Take a pass on this nice unit all bc of the owner

HA_HOTELNAME: praiamar 3f- sea front, cozy, private parking
Sentence: The apartment itself was quite run down and the power went out a few times when we plugged in the heater which had a short in it.
Verbatim: The apartment was in a very quiet part of the beach and was a good size. We did not appreciate having to pay an extra 30 euro late check-in fee because we arrived later than expected due to the rail strike on that day. The communication about the check-in process was terrible and we went all over the place trying to find the grumpy man who gave us our keys but was too lazy to even come up to the apartment to show us around. The apartment itself was quite run down and the power went out a few times when we plugged in the heater which had a short in it. There were a couple of issues that were rectified quickly but the hosts were very stingy about things like extra garbage bags or sufficient dishwashing soap for a two week stay. The big balcony facing the water was wonderful and there are many restaurants close by.

HA_HOTELNAME: rally point, creekside retreat in the smokies`
Sentence: The hot tub was dirty, the water has very strong iron smell and taste to the point of using bottle water to brush your teeth, the king size bed is not comfortable at all the couch is sectional and was not put together so it wanted to move the fire place did not work nor was it fixed during our stay and even after the hot was supposed to be cleaned it still had dirt and debris in it, was not as clean as it was made to seem.
Verbatim: The hot tub was dirty, the water has very strong iron smell and taste to the point of using bottle water to brush your teeth, the king size bed is not comfortable at all the couch is sectional and wasn't put together so it wanted to move the fire place didn't work nor was it fixed during our stay and even after the hot was supposed to be cleaned it still had dirt and debris in it, wasn't as clean as it was made to seem.

HA_HOTELNAME: cheerful 7 bedrooms villa with hot tub & pool.
REVIEW_TITLE: overall a great property - would stay here again
Sentence: Unfortunately unable to use the hot tub as it was not clean but only a short stay so difficult to rectify.
Verbatim: Unfortunately unable to use the hot tub as it was not clean but only a short stay so difficult to rectify. Well equipped to meet our needs and the owner was very responsive. Pictures of property were accurate

HA_HOTELNAME: spacious condo with amazing view and beachfront!
Sentence: Pools were pretty dirty when we were there tons of sand at the bottom.
Verbatim:
Some stuff great some stuff not so much.
Unit could use remodeling/updating its pretty run down but we don't stay indoors. Since this unit sleeps 6 there should be 6 of everything not only 4. Owner should purchase hangers and supply more in the kitchen however great communication. Wifi was terrible and only working in master bedroom area. Views were awesome and resort Ok. They are very strict on bringing coolers by pools and make you buy stuff there which is hefty however you can go to the beach. Bar was awesome great drinks and food but again pricey. Pools were pretty dirty when we were there tons of sand at the bottom. Check in process very friendly and smooth. Valet was great but expensive. Overall 3.5 rating. We will come again but more prepared. Cheers!

HA_HOTELNAME: luxurious remodeled villa in la quinta #a
Sentence: The property would be improved by replacing the filthy carpet with tile or laminate, sharpening the very dull kitchen knives and communicating with the guests about important things like how to get pool towels, how to get clean bath towels, etc.
Verbatim: The photos from the listing were accurate. The view from the balcony is lovely. The property would be improved by replacing the filthy carpet with tile or laminate, sharpening the very dull kitchen knives and communicating with the guests about important things like how to get pool towels, how to get clean bath towels, etc. The bedroom would be improved with a night table on both sides of the bed and by replacing the hanging rod in half of the closet with shelves. The bathroom needs more storage and a big walk in shower would be better than a bath/shower combo. Also, the balcony needs a sun shade so that it can be used throughout the day. Considering the volume of citrus fruit in the area, a citrus squeezer in the kitchen would be useful. We enjoyed the nearby hot tub during the cool evenings.

HA_HOTELNAME: adorable dog-friendly cottage with private yard, hot tub, grill, & central ac
Sentence: the hot tub was completely disgusting and green.
Verbatim: So on arrival we noticed things weren’t as clean as they should be, parking barely fits one car. You can see right through the entire home due to only having indoor/ out door blinds.. the hot tub was completely disgusting and green. Smelled like mildew and wasn’t even plugged in. Communication with staff trying to get someone out was ridiculous and took 18 hrs for someone to show up un announced . I drained and cleaned the hot tub myself. But it never even heated up fast enough for us to use. Neighbors window stay open and have zero privacy including that owner has a ring camera on the back door looking right at the hot tub. Wouldn’t book this house ever again. Absolute Waste of money.

HA_HOTELNAME: family & friend ready luxury vacation home
REVIEW_TITLE: great location not so great communication with property manager
Sentence: Oh and also the pool was disgusting!!
Verbatim: I’ll start with the good.. The location is absolutely perfect! So many restaurants, great area to walk around, Oasis pool is great for kids and adults. The house was a good size and easily accommodated groups 6-12 comfortable with plenty of bathrooms and beds. Now for the not so good.. the house was dirty! Walls look like they’ve never been cleaned, hair and dust on the floors and don’t me started on the carpets, GROSS. Having little kids with us I was constantly on edge as to what they put in their mouths and touched. Oh and also the pool was disgusting!! Upon calling about the pool being heated they said they never received the request and it would take 18 hours when we sent the request back in October. Okay fine, maybe it was overlooked not a big deal since the clubhouse pool was so nice and close by. But, the worst communication came when they sent me an email prior to arrival that all guests were added to our stay, we’ll Ofcourse they were not and everyone except myself got stuck at the gate waiting for me to get ahold of someone during non business hours (I finally got an answer after my 16th call to them). This property just added a lot of stress to what should have been a relaxing vacation stay. I have stayed at so many VRBOS & Air BNBs over the years and have never had an issue. Anyways, don’t let my experience sway you from coming to this property… a little better customer service along with a new cleaning company could make your stay great!

HA_HOTELNAME: beautiful home near beach with private pool, gas grill, washer/dryer - 1 dog ok
Sentence: The pool was dirty when we arrived and after 8 days it was still never cleaned.
Verbatim: This property is so far off the main road you can’t get a taxi or Uber so you must rent an suv. An SUV is a must since the roads are all dirt and have horrible dips. They only had a little car and we got 2 flat tires from the roads. We had no running water for 16 hours during the week. Then we had no power or water the last day we were trying to pack up to leave. The sofa was pretty dirty and you didn’t want to use. The shower head has such lower water pressure it’s hard to get all the shampoo and conditioner out so, I looked like a grease head the whole time. The pool was dirty when we arrived and after 8 days it was still never cleaned.
